TopicTitle: Counting down the days until KSP 1.0: Day 3

Articles.Content: Wheres day 2 and 1?

> 
> Wheres day 2 and 1?

Those would be Saturday and Sunday. You don't expect Squad to work on the weekend, do you? LOL.

I agree with you, though. There should have been Day 2 and Day 1 videos. That said, Scott Manley has quite a long video on YouTube showing the new features. His is way better than the miserable snippets that Squad released.

> 
> 11am BST and no patch presenting itself yet on Steam...

Squad is in Mexico. Ya gotta understand that Mexican time is different. Just so long as v 1.0 is posted by 2359 CST, then they've hit their deadline. MaÃƒÂ±ana, my man, maÃƒÂ±ana.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T15:01:47Z" title="04/27/2015 03:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Apollo13**

That and they had/have a 48 hour live stream event
Where is it squad i want it now:::: <3 <3

Keep the Announcements subsection open on a tab. Refresh it every half hour. When it is released, Squad will announce it there.

Stay sane! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> Squad is in Mexico. Ya gotta understand that Mexican time is different. Just so long as v 1.0 is posted by 2359 CST, then they've hit their deadline. MaÃƒÂ±ana, my man, maÃƒÂ±ana.

Does Mexico use Metric Time or Imperial Time? I'm using "I want 1.0 right now" time!

> 
> [h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.
> We appreciate your patience.

404 "patience" not found.

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I bought a SpaceNavigator as a treat to myself in anticipation of KSP 1.0. Just setting it up now.

> 
> I bought a SpaceNavigator as a treat to myself in anticipation of KSP 1.0. Just setting it up now.

Is it a SkyScout?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T16:53:15Z" title="04/27/2015 04:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Spacejuice**

No, it's one of these...

[http://www.3dconnexion.co.uk/products/spacemouse/spacenavigator.html](http://www.3dconnexion.co.uk/products/spacemouse/spacenavigator.html)

Works, but found a few annoying bugs in KSP already. Apparently they won't be fixed in 1.0 but whatever, I'll work around them.

Made a perfect landing on the island runway first time of asking! I had to reduce the sensitivity of the device in the settings though, it's pretty twitchy until you tune it just right. Flies a jet like a dream.
The site is online now!!!!
Cool!
Christmas in April!

AAaAAAAaaagghh I missed the big moment!

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Still, great job, Squad, can't wait to play 1.0!
Hooray! Finally we are there! Congrats, everybody!
site offline again ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
back =)

Only three more days guys!
